concept-wr.title: Network Planning
concept-wr.shortdesc: When planning the deployment of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, it is important to understand the available networking options and how to take advantage of them for the benefit of the end users. The sections that follow provide useful networking guidelines.
